title: Changes as slab is inserted with open switch

content.prompt: If, instead, the switch is open with the capacitor still fully charged when the slab is inserted, what changes, if any, occur?

choices.label:
Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate
Remains the same Increases

Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate
Remains the same Decreases

Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate
Increases Remains the same

Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate
Decreases Increases

Potential Difference Across the Plates Charge on Positive Plate
Decreases Remains the same

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
